title: How to Download & Install AMD Drivers: A Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Open your Web browser and go to https://www.amd.com/en/support.
steps.content: Open your Web browser and go to https://www.amd.com/en/support . This takes you to AMD’s Support page, where you’ll find a drop-down menu and search bar where you can find a list of different driver models. [1] X Expert Source Stan Kats Cybersecurity Expert Expert Interview. 24 June 2021.

steps.title: Select the driver you want to install.
steps.content: Select the driver you want to install. If you know the driver model for your system, select it in the menu. [2] X Expert Source Stan Kats Cybersecurity Expert Expert Interview. 24 June 2021. If you don’t know which driver to install on your system, download the Auto-Detect and Install Radeon Graphics Drivers for Windows program (located in the bottom-left corner of the Support page on AMD’s website) and run it to determine which AMD driver is compatible with your system.

steps.title: Click Submit.
steps.content: Click Submit . This will download the driver onto your PC. Before proceeding with installing the new driver software, make sure to uninstall any older versions of the driver from your system.

steps.title: Open the installer file.
steps.content: Open the installer file. Once the driver’s finished downloading, open the file and follow the on-screen instructions to install the AMD driver onto your system. [3] X Expert Source Stan Kats Cybersecurity Expert Expert Interview. 24 June 2021. During the setup, you’ll have two installation options: Accept and Express Install (installs the driver with default settings) and Accept and Custom Install (lets you configure the driver to your custom settings.

steps.title: Open Safari and go to Apple Boot Camp’s website.
steps.content: Open Safari and go to Apple Boot Camp’s website . Since most AMD drivers are designed for Windows, you’ll need this program to install Radeon graphics onto a Mac.

steps.title: Select the version compatible with your system.
steps.content: Select the version compatible with your system. Apple Boot Camp works with a variety of macOS and iOS systems, so there are plenty of options to choose from.

steps.title: Click Download.
steps.content: Click Download . This will download and install Apple Boot Camp onto your Mac.

steps.title: Open the installer and follow the installation instructions.
steps.content: Open the installer and follow the installation instructions. Once you’ve downloaded Apple Boot Camp, all you have to do is configure it with your system.
